title: The Darkest Part of the Forest
description: Near the little town of Fairfold, in the darkest part of the forest, is a glass casket. Inside lies a sleeping faerie prince that none can rouse. He's the most fascinating thing Hazel and her brother Ben have ever seen. They dream of waking him - but what happens when dreams come true?In the darkest part of the forest, you must be careful what you wish for â€¦
author: Holly Black
